mapper.select: select distinct a.code from AA_BOM a where a.name like '%${clientMaterialNo}%' and disabled=0
select distinct ac.idinventory from AA_BOM AS a INNER JOIN AA_BOMChild AS ac ON a.id=ac.idbom where a.code=#{0} and disabled=0
